go_data.justification: IR64a is expressed in OSNs activated by various odors, including esters, alcohols, and ketones.

go_data.term: detection of chemical stimulus involved in sensory perception
go_data.justification: IR64a is expressed in OSNs activated by free protons, organic acids, and other odors.
IR64a is expressed in different subpopulations of sensilla in the third chamber of the sacculus.
